title: Eden of Love
verses:
How sweet to reflect on those joys that await me,
In yon blissful region, the ha-ven of rest, Where
glorified spirits with welcome shall greet me, And lead me to
mansions prepared for the blest; En-cir-cled in light, and with
glo-ry en-shroud-ed, My hap-pi-ness perfect, my mind's sky un-

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the joy and glory of heaven awaiting believers
